title: Bihar Police CSBC Constable Download Admit Card 2025
description: The CSBC Bihar Police Constable Recruitment 2025 has been officially released for 19,838 posts in Bihar Police and Bihar Special Armed Police, with the online application process conducted from March 18 to April 25, 2025, via the official website csbc.bihar.gov.in, attracting over 16.7 lakh applicants, making it one of the most searched Bihar government job notifications in 2025. Candidates who passed 12th or equivalent, including Maulvi, Shastri, or Acharya qualifications, were eligible to apply, with an application fee of Rs 675 for General/OBC/EWS and Rs 180 for SC/ST and female candidates. The selection process includes a 100-mark written examination followed by a Physical Efficiency Test (PET), and candidates five times the number of vacancies will be shortlisted for the PET based on written exam performance. The Bihar Police Constable Exam 2025 will be held in six phases on July 16, 20, 23, 27, 30, and August 3, from 12 PM to 2 PM, with reporting time at 9:30 AM. The Bihar Police Admit Card 2025 has been released on July 9 and is available for download until July 16, along with city slips to inform candidates about their exam centers in advance.CSBC Bihar Police Constable Recruitment 2025, Bihar Police constable registration, Bihar Police admit card 2025, Bihar Police exam date 2025, Bihar Police vacancy 2025, Bihar government jobs, Bihar Special Armed Police recruitment.

title: SSC biharpoliceconstable2 / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)
